effect.en: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, your opponent discards the top card from his or her deck.

Flip a coin for each [R] Energy card attached to Shining Tyranitar. For each heads, discard a [R] Energy card attached to Shining Tyranitar or this attack does nothing. Then, for each heads, choose an Energy card attached to the Defending Pok√©mon and discard it. If it has fewer Energy cards than that, remove all of them.
